metadata.title: CVE-2016-2460 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-05-01 does not initialize certain datastructures, which allows attackers to obtain sensitive information via acrafted application, related to IGraphicBufferConsumer.cpp andIGraphicBufferProducer.cpp, aka internal bug 27555981.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
